H0.text: Apart from English, what is the official language of Canada. Spanish

H1.text: Apart from English, what is the official language of Canada. Mandarin

H2.text: Apart from English, what is the official language of Canada. Arabic

H3.text: Apart from English, what is the official language of Canada. French

A4.text: The official languages of Canada are English and French, which 'have equality of status and equal rights and privileges as to their use in all institutions of the Parliament and Government of Canada,' according to Canada's constitution.
